name: Exemption for sale of net operating loss by qualified high technology business
text:
Effective January 1, 2001, there shall be exempted from the measure of taxes imposed by this chapter all of the value or gross income derived from the sale of a net operating loss by a qualified high technology business defined in section 235-7.3 or by any partner, member, or shareholder of a qualified high technology business in the case of partnerships, limited liability partnerships, limited liability companies classified as partnerships, and S corporations.
     This section shall be repealed on December 31, 2005. [L 2001, c 221, pt of §3]
